description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2kedf","text":"This protocol describes the procedure to prepare E8 Supplement and complete E8 medium for hPSC maintenance culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"5srpt","text":"We recommend storage of all the media components in their recommended storage conditions up to one year. Similarly, we recommend that the prepared E8 supplement be stored in -80oC up to one year. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":177,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
